description:
Join over 1900 students in learning how to play the piano!

4.94 Star Rating Average. 18+ stellar reviews from real students.

Here is what one student had to say: "I've always had an ear for music but could never make time in my life to learn nor have I ever had anyone to teach me. These lessons are great and very interesting and informative. I'm learning, slowly but surely. Thank you Tim !."

If you take this course, you will learn how to read music and how to play easy songs on the piano.

Difficulty Level: 1 (EASY)

This Class Covers:

-Finding notes on the keyboard

-Reading music notes for both the treble clef and bass clef

-Playing simple rhythms

-Playing simple songs

-Playing with simple dynamics

My name is Tim and I have a Bachelors of Music from West Chester University of Pennsylvania. I have taught dozens and dozens of students locally and have been teaching online for about 3 years. I have taken my music knowledge and compiled it into this course for students around the world who are looking for an easy way of learning piano without spending thousands on lessons.

Did I mention that there is a 30 day money back guarantee. No risk, enroll today and begin learning to play the piano!
title: The Beginners Course for Piano
